summary: Implemented incremental summary updates per phase. Summaries now become running logs with per-phase entries, providing visibility into partial progress across sessions. Updated 13 files including both implementation agents, both skill postflight handlers, and format documentation. Created metadata-quick-ref.md for context efficiency.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with 7 phase entries demonstrating incremental format

completion_data.completion_summary: Transformed implementation summaries from single-completion artifacts to running logs with per-phase entries. Updated both Lean and general implementation agents with Stage 4F/step 6 for summary updates, modified Stage 6 to finalize rather than create, and updated skill postflight to link summaries for partial status.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Created metadata-quick-ref.md, updated summary-format.md with Incremental Summary Format section, updated lean-implementation-flow.md with Stage 4F, updated both agent Critical Requirements, updated both skill postflight Stage 8
